turns
Class Turn

java.lang.Object
  turns.Turn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Saveable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Turn.RunnableTurn
public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
implements Saveable, Drawable

Turn contains data about each turn (between every step). Turns should only be constructed directly after a full step() finishes

Author:
Niels Thykier

Nested Class Summary
static class Turn.RunnableTurn
          This handles iterating through the list of sensors in their turn-based order and then allowing them to execute their phases.

Constructor Detail

Turn

protected Turn(java.util.Collection<? extends Sensor> sensors,
               int sortBy,
               int turn,
               boolean roll)
Constructs a turn from the parameters.

Parameters:
sensors - The sensors to be included in the turn.
sortBy - How the sensors should be sorted.
turn - The id of the turn.
roll - true means the sensors should roll their turn order before they are sorted.
